revised_title: The Locomotor System and Movements of Medusae
tldr: The author examines the locomotor system and movements of Medusae, focusing on the nervous system and histology. They discuss the structure and function of the nervous system in Medusae, as well as the movements and responses of these animals to various stimuli. The author also compares and contrasts the findings of other researchers, such as Agassiz and Haeckel, in this field.
